title: VR for Web Developers with A-Frame
body: From 2016 to 2018 I was fortunate to have the opportunity to speak about Virtual Reality on the web on three different continents. During this time I also joined Mozilla Tech Speakers and mentored a cohort of new speakers. You can see the slides from a version of the talk that I gave [here](https://speakerdeck.com/rapoulson/vr-for-web-developers-with-a-frame).
